metadata.title: The wet dog
metadata.user_prompt: The story of a dog that get lost in the rain for chasing a squirrel but find its way back home

pages.text: Il était une fois un chien courageux nommé Rex. Un jour, alors qu'il jouait dans le jardin, il vit un écureuil.
Rex a décidé de poursuivre l'écureuil. Il a couru si vite qu'il a perdu de vue sa maison. Soudain, il a commencé à pleuvoir.
Rex était perdu et mouillé. Mais il était un chien courageux. Il n'a pas paniqué et a commencé à chercher le chemin du retour.
Il a suivi l'odeur de sa maison et le son de la voix de sa famille. La pluie a cessé et un arc-en-ciel est apparu dans le ciel.
Rex a finalement retrouvé son chemin de retour à la maison. Sa famille était si heureuse de le voir ! Et Rex a appris une leçon précieuse : ne jamais courir trop loin de la maison.

characters.name: Rex
characters.physical_description: Rex is a medium-sized dog with a muscular build, standing about 2 feet tall. He has a thick, shiny coat of golden fur, with a lighter, almost white, color on his belly. His tail is long and bushy, often wagging energetically. He has a broad face with a black, wet nose, and bright, alert brown eyes. His ears are floppy, hanging down the sides of his head.
characters.distinctive_features: Rex has a small white patch of fur on his forehead, shaped like a star. His front left paw also has a unique pattern, with one of his toes being white while the rest are golden.
characters.personality_traits: Rex's courage and adventurous spirit are often visible in his alert, bright eyes and the confident way he carries himself. His energetic tail wagging and playful demeanor show his friendly and outgoing nature.

characters.name: écureuil
characters.physical_description: The squirrel is small in size, about 8 inches long. It has a bushy tail that is as long as its body. Its fur is a vibrant reddish-brown color, with a lighter, cream-colored belly. Its eyes are large, round, and black, giving it an alert and curious look. It has small, rounded ears that stick up from the top of its head, and sharp, tiny claws for climbing trees.
characters.distinctive_features: The squirrel's most distinctive features are its bushy tail and its large, round eyes. It also has a small, pointed nose and sharp claws.
characters.personality_traits: The squirrel is playful and curious, always on the move and exploring its surroundings. It is also a bit skittish, ready to dart away at the first sign of danger.

characters.name: famille de Rex
characters.physical_description: Rex is a medium-sized dog with a muscular build. He has a thick, glossy coat of black fur with white patches on his chest and paws. His eyes are a bright, intelligent blue, and his ears are perky and alert. His tail is long and bushy, often wagging with enthusiasm.
characters.distinctive_features: Rex has a unique white patch on his chest that looks like a star. He also has a small scar on his right ear from a past adventure.
characters.personality_traits: Rex's courage and determination are evident in his confident stance and the determined set of his jaw. His eyes sparkle with intelligence and curiosity. His wagging tail and perky ears show his enthusiasm and energy.
